name: Robo Climber
description:
Description

Climb up the tower in this Jump King / Megaman mix of a game!  This game was made as part of the Global Game Jam 2021: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/robot-prison-escape-9

Controls 

Hold jump to jump higher. 

KeyboardGamepadActionWASD / ArrowsLeft stickMoveSpacebarACharge jump-Left shoulder buttonRotate camera left+Right shoulder buttonRotate camera right
